anya-e1203n:302_0: Gantvā so dhammarājā vanamisipatanaṃ saññatānaṃ niketaṃ,
anya-e1203n:310_0: Obhāso pātubhuto sapadi bahuvidhaṃ āsi accherakañca.
anya-e1203n:313_0: Tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinento devamānuse,
anya-e1203n:319_0: Yakkhānaṃ samitiṃ gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahiṃ;
anya-e1203n:335_0: Datvā namassituṃ kese agā jetavanaṃ jino.
anya-e1203n:380_0: So satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi padalañchanaṃ.
anya-e1203n:413_0: Subhaddaṃ majjhime yāme pāpetvā amataṃ padaṃ.
anya-e1203n:427_0: Ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e1203n:440_0: Citakaṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu gāhāpetuṃ hutāsanaṃ.
anya-e1203n:449_0: Na masi satthudehassa daḍḍhassāsi na chārikā.
anya-e1203n:454_0: Uṇhīsaṃ akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyo;
anya-e1203n:455_0: Iccetā dhātuyo satta vippakiṇṇā na satthuno.
anya-e1203n:476_0: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṃ.
anya-e1203n:481_0: Dantadhātuṃ tato khemo attanā gahitaṃ adā;
anya-e1203n:484_0: Desayitvāna so dhammaṃ bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyo;
anya-e1203n:562_0: Taṃ dhātuṃ pūjayitvāna rājāno pubbakā idha;
anya-e1203n:566_0: Pūjayanti samāgamma dhātuṃ taṃ satthuno iti.
anya-e1203n:568_0: Tassāmaccassa so rājā sutvā dhammaṃ subhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1203n:571_0: Dhātupūjaṃ karonto so rājā acchariyā vahaṃ;
anya-e1203n:578_0: Pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake.
anya-e1203n:593_0: Nindanno tādise deve chavaṭṭhiṃ vandate iti.
anya-e1203n:599_0: Pūjitaṃ taṃ chavaṭṭhiñca tena rattindivaṃ iti.
anya-e1203n:607_0: Sutvā āgamanaṃ tassa kaliṅgo so mahipati;
anya-e1203n:616_0: Tato so sumano gantvā paviṭṭho rājamandiraṃ;
anya-e1203n:632_0: Jano hi avajānanto addhā so vañcito iti.
anya-e1203n:638_0: Tena saddhiṃ mahagghaṃ taṃ agamā dhātumandiraṃ.
anya-e1203n:684_0: Accheraṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ cittayāno narindo,
anya-e1203n:691_0: Taṃ sāsanaṃ paṇḍunarādhipassa ñāpesi dhīro duratikkamaṃ’ti.
anya-e1203n:693_0: Rājātato dantapuraṃ dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi;
anya-e1203n:697_0: Samubbahanto sirasā nijena mahārahaṃ dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ taṃ.
anya-e1203n:708_0: Kaliṅghanātho kusumādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
anya-e1203n:709_0: Dine dine addhani dantadhātuṃ pūjesi saddhiṃ vanadevatāhi.
anya-e1203n:712_0: Ādāya dhātuṃ manujādhinātho agā puraṃ pāṭali puttanāmaṃ.
anya-e1203n:714_0: Rājādhirājo’tha sabhāya majjhe disvāna taṃ vītabhayaṃ visaṅkaṃ;
anya-e1203n:724_0: Mohandhabhutā atha titthiyā te taṃ dantadhātuṃ abhinikkhipiṃsu.
anya-e1203n:729_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jinadantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:730_0: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi.
anya-e1203n:732_0: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ manussā pasannacittā ratanādikehi;
anya-e1203n:735_0: So paṇḍurājā pana diṭṭhijālaṃ cirānubaddhaṃ apariccajanto;
anya-e1203n:739_0: Pubbācalaṭṭho’va sudhāmarīci jotesi raṃsīhi disā samantā.
anya-e1203n:741_0: Disvānubhāvaṃ jinadantadhātu yāpajji so vimbhaya maggarājā;
anya-e1203n:742_0: Eko’tha issāpasuto nigaṇṭho taṃ rājarājānamidaṃ avoca.
anya-e1203n:744_0: Rāmādayo deva janaddanassa nānāvatārā bhuvane ahesuṃ;
anya-e1203n:747_0: Addhā manussattamupāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivaṃ gatassa;
anya-e1203n:754_0: Yaṭicchitaṃ gaṇhatha vatthujātaṃ iccāha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe.
anya-e1203n:756_0: Te titthiyā viṇahusuraṃ guṇehi vicitta rūpehi abhitthavitvā;
anya-e1203n:757_0: Toyena siñciṃsu saṭhā tathāpi ṭhitappadesā na calittha dhātu.
anya-e1203n:759_0: Jigucchamāno atha te nigaṇṭhe so dhātuyānīharaṇe upāyaṃ;
anya-e1203n:760_0: Anvesamāno vasudhādhinātho bheriṃ carāpesi sake puramhi.
anya-e1203n:766_0: Tasmiṃ pure seṭṭhisuto subhaddo pāvekkhirañño samitiṃ pagabbho.
anya-e1203n:768_0: Tamaggarājaṃ atha so namitvā sāmājikānaṃ hadayaṅgamāya;
anya-e1203n:771_0: Bhumiṃ kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramaṃ jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ;
anya-e1203n:772_0: Yo kārayitvāna jinassa datvā upaṭṭhahi taṃ catupaccayehi.
anya-e1203n:780_0: Chaddantanāgo savisena viddho sallena yo lohitamakkhi taṅgo;
anya-e1203n:781_0: Chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante.
anya-e1203n:786_0: Yo bodhiyā bāhiravatthudānā atittarūpo sivirāja seṭṭho;
anya-e1203n:787_0: Adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya.
anya-e1203n:792_0: Yo dhammapālo api sattamāsa jātopaduṭṭhe janakesakamhi;
anya-e1203n:793_0: Kārāpayante asimālakammaṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi patāparāje.
anya-e1203n:795_0: Sākhāmigo yo asatā pumena vane papātā sayamuddhaṭena;
anya-e1203n:796_0: Silāya bhinne’pi sake lalāṭe taṃ khemabhumiṃ anayitthamūḷhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:799_0: Samuṭṭhite sajjumahāravinde ṭhatvāna yo seṭṭhi adāsi dānaṃ.
anya-e1203n:804_0: Yo sattavasso visikhāya paṃsu kīḷāparo sambhavanāmako’pi;
anya-e1203n:807_0: Hitvā nikantiṃ sakajīvite’pi baddhāsakucchimhi ca vettavalliṃ;
anya-e1203n:811_0: Isī’va katvā atha ñāyaganthaṃ nijaṃ pavattesi cirāya dhammaṃ.
anya-e1203n:825_0: Buddho bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukhānapekkho karuṇānuvattī;
anya-e1203n:829_0: Ajeyyasatthaṃ paramiddhipattaṃ damesi yo ālavakampī yakkhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:832_0: Bhetvāna diṭṭhiṃ sucirānubaddhaṃ damesi yo brahmavaraṃ munindo.
anya-e1203n:838_0: Mahādayo duppasahaṃ parehi damesi yo aṅgulimālacoraṃ.
anya-e1203n:841_0: Saddhamma saññaṃ ratanākarañca ogāhayī saṃ parisaṃ samaggaṃ.
anya-e1203n:846_0: Anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippaṃ samāruyha nabhantarāḷaṃ;
anya-e1203n:849_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā jinadantadhātu nabhaṃ samuggamma pabhāsayantī;
anya-e1203n:850_0: Sabbā disā osadhitārakā’va janaṃ pasādesi vtiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:852_0: Athotaritvā gaganaṅgaṇamhā sā matthake seṭṭhisutassa tassa;
anya-e1203n:855_0: Dasvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ nigaṇṭhā iccabravuṃ paṇḍunarādhipaṃ taṃ;
anya-e1203n:856_0: Vijjābalaṃ seṭṭhisutassa etaṃ na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvo.
anya-e1203n:858_0: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ narindo iccabravī seṭṭhisutaṃ subhaddaṃ;
anya-e1203n:859_0: Yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyuṃ tathāvidhaṃ dassaya iddhimaññaṃ.
anya-e1203n:864_0: Sā rājahaṃ sī’va vidhāvamānā sugandhitoyamhi padakkhiṇena;
anya-e1203n:865_0: Ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi.
anya-e1203n:867_0: Tato ca kāsuṃ visikhāyamajjhe katvā tahiṃ dhātumabhikkhipitvā;
anya-e1203n:868_0: Paṃsūhi sammā abhipūrayitvā bahūhi maddāpayi kuñjarehi.
anya-e1203n:874_0: Obhāsayanti’va disā pabhāhi diṭṭhā muhuttena jinassadhātu.
anya-e1203n:876_0: Khipiṃsu vatthābharaṇāni maccā pavassayuṃ pupphamayañca vassaṃ;
anya-e1203n:877_0: Ukkuṭṭhisaddehi ca sadhukāranādehi puṇṇaṃ nagaraṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1203n:879_0: Te titthiyā taṃ abhivañcanaṃ’ti rājādhirājaṃ atha saññapetvā;
anya-e1203n:880_0: Jigucchanīye kuṇapādikehi khipiṃsu dhātuṃ parikhāya piṭṭhe.
anya-e1203n:883_0: Madhubbatālī virutābhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī’va nandā.
anya-e1203n:885_0: Gajādhipā koññcaravaṃ raviṃsu kariṃsu hesāninadaṃ turaṅgā;
anya-e1203n:889_0: Vatthāni sīse bhamayiṃsu mattā bhujāni poṭhesumudaggacittā.
anya-e1203n:895_0: Atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṃsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa.
anya-e1203n:897_0: Disvāna yo īdisakampi rāja iddhānubhāvaṃ munipuṅgavassa;
anya-e1203n:898_0: Pasādamattampi kareyya noce kimatthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā.
anya-e1203n:900_0: Pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanaṃ sādhujanassa dhammo;
anya-e1203n:901_0: Pupphanti sabbe sayameva vande samuggate komudakānanāni.
anya-e1203n:903_0: Vācāya tesaṃ pana dummatīnaṃ mā saggamaggaṃ pajahittha rāja;
anya-e1203n:904_0: Andhe gahetvā vicareyya ko hi anvesamāno supathaṃ amūḷho.
anya-e1203n:906_0: Narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodanādi api tejavantā;
anya-e1203n:907_0: Taṃ dhammarājaṃ saraṇaṃ upecca piviṃsu dhammāmatamādarena.
anya-e1203n:910_0: Upecca dhammaṃ vimalaṃ nisamma alattha āyuṃ api diṭṭhadhammo.
anya-e1203n:916_0: Senāpatiṃ atthavaraṃ avoca pahaṭṭhabhāvo parisāya majjhe.
anya-e1203n:919_0: Cirāya dulladdhipathe caranto ṭhito sarajje api vañcitohaṃ.
anya-e1203n:921_0: Mohena khajjopanakaṃ dhamesiṃ sītaddito dhumasikhe jalante;
anya-e1203n:922_0: Pipāsito sindhujalaṃ pahāya piviṃ pamādena marīcitoyaṃ.
anya-e1203n:924_0: Pariccajitvā amataṃ cirāya jivatthiko tikkhavisaṃ akhādiṃ;
anya-e1203n:927_0: Gantvāna khippaṃ parikhā samīpaṃ ārādhayitvā jinadantadhātuṃ;
anya-e1203n:928_0: Ānehi pūjāvidhinā karissaṃ puññāni sabbattha sukhāvahāni.
anya-e1203n:931_0: Dhātuṃ munindassa namassamāno ajjhesi rañño hitamā caranto
anya-e1203n:933_0: Cirāgataṃ diṭṭhimalaṃ pahāya alattha saddhaṃ sugate narindo;
anya-e1203n:936_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇasaroruhehi;
anya-e1203n:940_0: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbaṃ khirodakucchiṃ’va puraṃ akāsi.
anya-e1203n:943_0: Sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalaṃ mānusakaṃ akattha.
anya-e1203n:954_0: Vīmaṃsanatthāya tavādhunāpi mayā kataṃ sabbamidaṃ muninda;
anya-e1203n:955_0: Āguṃ mahantaṃ khama bhuripañña khippaṃ mamālaṅkuru uttamaṅgaṃ.
anya-e1203n:957_0: Patiṭṭhitā tassa tato kirīṭe maṇippabhā bhāsini dantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:958_0: Amuñci raṃsī dhavalā pajāsu sinehajātā iva khīradhārā.
anya-e1203n:964_0: Patiṭṭhapetvāna jinassa dhātuṃ pūjesi rājā ratanādikehi.
anya-e1203n:967_0: Hitvā vihiṃsaṃ karuṇādhivāso ārādhayī sabbajanaṃ guṇehi.
anya-e1203n:972_0: Vaḍḍhesi so dhātugharamhi dhātuṃ alaṅkaritvā sakalaṃ purampi;
anya-e1203n:973_0: Sesena pūjāvidhinā atitto pūjesi raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhoggaṃ.
anya-e1203n:1020_0: Nikhila guṇa nivāso so kumāro karitvā;
anya-e1203n:1051_0: Nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassaṃ,
anya-e1203n:1052_0: Ahamapi yadi jetuṃ neva te sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
anya-e1203n:1059_0: Tavaca mamaca ko vā sīhaḷe bandhubhūto,
anya-e1203n:1069_0: Mama ca piyasahāyo so mahāsena rājā,
anya-e1203n:1087_0: Turita turita bhūto so puramhā paḷāyi.
anya-e1203n:1258_0: Itthaṃ buddhisute bhujaṅgajanitaṃ bhītiṃ sametvā gate,
anya-e1203n:1259_0: Sā nāvā pavanā pakampitadhajā tuṅgaṃ taraṅgāvaliṃ;
anya-e1203n:1287_0: Sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghanandhakārā
anya-e1203n:1483_0: Sabbe’pi te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū,
anya-e1203n:1489_0: Rājā avo ca puna bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
anya-e1203n:1550_0: Tuṭṭhā tahiṃ yatigaṇā manujā ca sabbe,
